task.title: Sending a file during a chat
task.shortdesc: When you're in a chat conversation you can send a photo or file to your chat partner provided that the administrator enabled this feature..

context.p: Meeting policies determine whether the availability to send files is available to you. The administrator configures the policy setting.

Files that a chat partner sends to you arrive in your chat window either as a photo or an attached file to download. When you click Download to received a file, you have the option to preview or save the file.

step.cmd: Click the attach icon () and select the type of file to send.

dlentry.dd: Take a photo with the phone camera and send it in the chat.
Select a photo that you saved on your phone or attached drive, and send it in the chat.
Select a file and send it in a chat. The file can be a document, graphic, audio, or video file.

choices.choice: If you are sending a photo, select the photo and then click OK.
If taking a photo, the camera app opens. Take the photo and click OK. When prompted to send the photo, click OK.
If sending a file, select the file . The app uploads the file to the conversation for the recipient to download.
